item.title: Test DNS filtering
item.description: Test DNS filteringThis section covers how to validate your Gateway DNS configuration. ​​ Prerequisites Before you start, make sure you are connected to a network that is associated with the DNS location where the policy is applied. ​​ Test a DNS policy Once you have created a DNS policy to block a domain, you can use either dig or nslookup to see if the policy is working as intended.

item.title: Scheduled DNS policies
item.description: Scheduled DNS policiesCloudflare Gateway allows you to configure any DNS policy to activate or deactivate on a regular time interval. By default, Gateway policies are unscheduled and apply at all times. You can use the Gateway Rules API to create a new DNS policy with a schedule or add a schedule to an existing policy. To schedule a policy, send a POST or PUT request with the schedule parameter set to your desired days of the week, times of day, and an optional time zone.
